mapper.sql: SELECT PAGING.* FROM ( SELECT ORACLE_PAGING.* , ROWNUM AS RNUM FROM (
) ORACLE_PAGING WHERE ROWNUM <= #{endCount} ) PAGING WHERE RNUM >= #{startCount}
mapper.select:
SELECT A.MSG_STATUS, A.CODE, A.MSG_TITLE, A.MSG_CONT, A.MSG_TYPE, A.RECV_PHONE_NO, A.SEND_TYPE,
A.REG_ID, TO_CHAR(A.UPD_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS UPD_DT, A.UPD_ID, TO_CHAR(A.SEND_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS SEND_DT, A.SVR_ID, (SELECT HOST_NM FROM TB_SVR_INFO where SVR_ID=A.SVR_ID) as WAS_INFO, A.ORG_NO, A.CALLBACK_NO, A.MSG_ID, A.SEND_TRY_CNT FROM TB_CAR_PUSH_QUEUE_HIS A WHERE 1=1
AND A.PROCESS_DT >= TO_DATE(#{startDate},'YYYY-MM-DD') and A.PROCESS_DT < TO_DATE(#{endDate},'YYYY-MM-DD')
ORDER BY A.PROCESS_DT desc

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT A.MSG_STATUS, A.CODE, A.MSG_TITLE, A.MSG_CONT, A.MSG_TYPE, A.RECV_PHONE_NO, A.SEND_TYPE,
A.REG_ID, TO_CHAR(A.UPD_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS UPD_DT, A.UPD_ID, TO_CHAR(A.SEND_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS SEND_DT, A.SVR_ID, (SELECT HOST_NM FROM TB_SVR_INFO where SVR_ID=A.SVR_ID) as WAS_INFO, A.ORG_NO, A.CALLBACK_NO, A.MSG_ID, A.SEND_TRY_CNT FROM TB_CAR_PUSH_QUEUE_HIS A WHERE 1=1
AND A.PROCESS_DT >= TO_DATE(#{startDate},'YYYY-MM-DD') and A.PROCESS_DT < TO_DATE(#{endDate},'YYYY-MM-DD')
)

SELECT ORACLE_PAGING.* , ROWNUM AS RNUM FROM ( SELECT
CASE A.MSG_STATUS WHEN '0000' THEN '대기' WHEN '0001' THEN '전송처리중' WHEN '0002' THEN '전송 성공' ELSE '전송 실패' END as MSG_STATUS, A.CODE, A.MSG_TITLE, A.MSG_CONT, A.MSG_TYPE, A.RECV_PHONE_NO, A.SEND_TYPE,
A.REG_ID, TO_CHAR(A.UPD_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS UPD_DT, A.UPD_ID, TO_CHAR(A.SEND_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS SEND_DT, A.SVR_ID, (SELECT HOST_NM FROM TB_SVR_INFO where SVR_ID=A.SVR_ID) as WAS_INFO, A.ORG_NO, A.CALLBACK_NO, A.MSG_ID, A.SEND_TRY_CNT FROM TB_CAR_PUSH_QUEUE_HIS A WHERE 1=1 AND A.PROCESS_DT >= TO_DATE(#{startDate},'YYYY-MM-DD') and A.PROCESS_DT < TO_DATE(#{endDate},'YYYY-MM-DD')
ORDER BY A.PROCESS_DT desc ) ORACLE_PAGING
